storyInfo: 22 years ago, before he became the 'Sand Soldier,' Elliot is on the run with Kal'tsit, attempting to make their way to the Reefsteep black markets and escape Sargon. They need someone to lead them to the black markets, and, by chance, a helping hand appears before Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: 22 Years Ago
3:09 P.M. \ Clear
Central Sargon, Ibut Region, Desert Outskirts
Are... Are we there yet? How far away is it?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: If you're tired, we can stop here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Drop the tough act.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It has been 7 hours and 14 minutes since our transport was wrecked in the ambush. Considering your physique and age, you've held up pretty well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No need...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Let's... keep going. We need to get out of here as soon as we can...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Where are we...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The nearest town to where we are heading. More accurately, it's a settlement formed of several towns that had been drifting in the desert with their hauling equipment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At the same time, this place covers a large swath of Sargon's no man's land, more than anywhere else. This is the way out for illegal immigrants, bounty hunters, and Messengers.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why aren't we going to Minos?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I'm... I'm still not sure I can trust you any more than those mercenaries... What makes you different?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: The difference is that you are alive.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You already have our next steps figured out, don't you...? What are we doing now?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: We'll look for someone trustworthy to take us out of Ibut. Not legally, of course.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Where are we going after that? Leithanien? Bolívar?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Before I give you an answer, you must understand that, whatever your choice, it doesn't change the fact you are running away from your problems.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You have no way to survive, nowhere to go, and nowhere to run.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you prepared to accept the fact that your old life has already shattered to pieces? Do you understand it? Are you sure you are not just in a daze from this sudden turn of events?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Stop acting so high and mighty...
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: If anger gives you a clearer head.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will be going further north. Far away enough for you to leave everything in Columbia and Sargon behind.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have to say. You've done very well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you mocking me...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Much of what you do is rife with immaturity, and you let your emotions get the better of you. If you were a little older, I would indeed make a mockery of you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's go. We need to find someone to introduce us to the black market here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Where do we find someone like that?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I don't know yet...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmph, so there's stuff you don't know?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: I won't deny it, but we'll find them very soon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you understand what 'The Land of Reefsteep' means and stands for, you won't have any trouble finding their survivors in the crowds and markets here. They will always help their fellow countrymen. All we have to do is make them believe that's who we are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh... What's that you're holding... Sargon coins?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: What can you even do with a few coins...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: You'll know soon enough.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Get lost, Columbian...!
attributes.name: Sargon Townsfolk?

attributes.content: Huh? Enem—?!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Hiss)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Arghhh—Ahhhh—Monster! Where did it come from—?!
attributes.name: Sargon Townsfolk?

attributes.content: (Thrusts)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Gah... Dammit... Why...?! I can't hurt it...!
attributes.name: Sargon Townsfolk?

attributes.content: What's going on?! Ahhh—A monster! A monster's here to kill us!
attributes.name: Passerby Sargon Townsfolk

attributes.content: That's a huge crowd... Hey, what's going on? Who's this guy?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: A bounty hunter from Vouivre... Looks like they're expanding their search area.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Quick. Follow me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh, wait—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: We came all the way here, but anyone walking down the street could still be a hitman. What's the point of coming—
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: That's exactly why you need to pick up the pace.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What I'm saying is you haven't solved anything, Adviser Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: These outfits make us stand out, don't they...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Sargonian) This is just a can of vegetables. Why is it so expensive?
attributes.name: Peddling Voices

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Our rugs are famous far and wide—Something wrong with our quality? Impossible!
attributes.name: Peddling Voices

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Genuine top-grade earthenware jugs once used by the Lord Ameer—Sixty? Down from sixty thousand? Whatever, sold!
attributes.name: Peddling Voices

attributes.content: There's a lot of people here... Is this where the market is?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: ...? Why'd you stop—Mm?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Being superstitious this time...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: Ah... How rare... It has been a long time since an outsider paid Old Isin a visit.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Do you wish to take a peek at what destiny has laid out before you, or perhaps you are searching for a particular piece of gravel in this sandstorm?
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Am I correct to assume you are responsible for the ruckus earlier?
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Old Isin can tell, dear traveler. You are in a hurry, and trouble follows in your footsteps... Old Isin simply hopes this won't lead to any more trouble for Sargon...
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: You are not from Sargon, no, but you carry a great burden...
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: What is he mumbling to himself about...? Let's not waste any more time on him, Kal'tsit. They'll catch up!
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Sargonian) You fraud! What are you still doing here?! Scram!
attributes.name: Sargon Villager

attributes.content: (Sargonian) You're mucking up our turf! Enough with your tricks! No one here's going to fall for that!
attributes.name: Sargon Villager

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Oh, right, of course. Don't be so violent now... Old Isin will leave. Old Isin is leaving.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Is your master doing well? Has she taken Old Isin's advice and pulled out of that deal yet? It will mean nothing but trouble for her.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) My master? The chief would never listen to you jabbering types in the first place. If any lunatic in town could just waltz in and tell us how to do business, we might as well set up a suggestion box!
attributes.name: Sargon Villager

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Enough chit-chat! Get out of here!
attributes.name: Sargon Villager

attributes.content: Hmm!
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Are you okay...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Agh... It hurts... Please, don't worry. Old Isin's gotten used to it long ago...
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Old Isin cannot save them. Old Isin cannot get them to come around... Old Isin can do nothing but watch as they draw ever closer to their destruction day after day.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Please accept Old Isin's apologies, but as you can see, Old Isin is being thrown out of this place. If there is anywhere willing to take in poor Old Isin, that's where Old Isin will go.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Wait.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Old Isin mustn't... Old Isin mustn't...
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Stay out of this. If he doesn't leave, it's gonna be on our heads. Just let him go!
attributes.name: Sargon Villager

attributes.content: (Sargonian) She's right. Her master calls the shots here, and she mustn't be trifled with. Let Old Isin leave, kind traveler. Let Old Isin return to his ice-cold home.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Why are we wasting our time here on this old conman again?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: At least you can tell he's old.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: But you can't imagine how old he is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The sun has set long ago, traveler. You are in a hurry, and there are dangers abound. Why waste your time here with Old Isin?
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) As time goes by, even the greatest Padishah will one day be lost to the sands. His achievements will at that point crumble, and his subjects will scatter across the lands.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) From the way you are dressed, you don't seem to be Sargonian. Is this perhaps the beginning to a narrative poem? Old Isin is far too old. Old Isin has long forgotten the appeal of poetry.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) But his servants remain ever dedicated to their duties. They guard the unpopulated desert until a new civilization is ready to stand atop its sands, until the time a new Padishah arrives with the will of Sargon to rebuild those lands.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Ah, similar stories happen in all countries in the world time and again.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Catastrophes, diseases, war... There are a great many ways a city can meet its end... and to find itself conquered by a new, spirited ruler, thereby repeating the cycle once again.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (What are they saying... Is this how Sargonian sounds?)
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: (Sargonian) 150 years ago, before these golden sands were named Ibut, there stood a magnificent city here. Do you remember anything of it?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Of course... Old Isin remembers. The city that disappeared in those great winds.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) The Padishah at the time gave these lands brimming with sand a name that might seem unfitting for a place in Sargon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Reefsteep...
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) The only thing that remains of it is its name, passed down from one generation to the next, with none of them ever laying their eyes on its lush oases.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) Are you its gatekeeper, then?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Is there anything Old Isin can do for you?
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: We want to escape Sargon, leaving no tracks.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... Old Isin understands. Whose attention are you trying to avoid?
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Not even Padishah can know of our whereabouts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: Please call me Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... Lady Kal'tsit... As Old Isin gazed upon the sunrise this morning, Old Isin slipped back into my dreams in a trance. In Old Isin's dreams, Old Isin was told there would be a visitor who would revel in these secrets of antiquity with us.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: You came early. The price is a single gold coin, my fair lady.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: You deserve it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Just that much...?)
attributes.name: Elliot

attributes.content: No, no... Not yet. Please hold on to it, my lady.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: This is a price that you will pay—22 years later. Remember this promise well, for it is worth far more than this gold coin.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Sargonian) You have lived in Sargon in its current form for the past hundred years. I suppose... not a single moment has gone by where you didn't look back and reminisce your homeland.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Sargonian) You are correct, my lady, but today is different.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller

attributes.content: (Stranger Sargonian) You opened the door for us.
attributes.name: Mysterious Fortune Teller
